name: EWS MSAL
description: The EWS MSAL integration provides the similar functions from EWS O365. This integration is used for clients who wants to authenticate Azure AD Self deployed application using Username and Password (ROPC Flow https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/active-directory/develop/v2-oauth-ropc). This ROPC authentication method allows an application to sign in the user by directly handling their password.
author: Hiep Nguyen
